summary:
Fluently French, Dutch and English, driven and well organised, with strong analytical and communication skills, and an intercultural experience. I am a solution-oriented problem solver, multitasked, social, and an energetic team worker, able to communicate effectively with people of different cultures.
Passionate about FMCG, I’ve developed skills in trade marketing, category management, brand management, consulting, data analytics, sales and key account management.

Master's Degree in Marketing @Toulouse Business School, triple accredited Business School part of the French Top 10.

school.name: CPGE au lycée Notre Dame de la Merci

projects.title: Responsable sponsoring du projet Snowlidarité
projects.description: Projet entrepreneurial avec 5 autres étudiants: organisation d’une compétition de snowboard à Font Romeu (Pyrénées) dans le but de reverser les bénéfices à l’association Handikraft66 (association de handiski) : travail en équipe, animation de réunions, recherche de sponsors, création de contrats, démarchage, phoning, porte à porte, mailing, recherche de participants.

profile_positions.description:
Key account management interim role (for health and personal care) on top of the OTC Trade marketing responsibilities. 

Main sales activities are: 
- Maintain an optimal relationship with the key accounts (drugstores, supermarkets, pure players, pharmacies and wholesalers) 
- Achieve budget 2023
- Lead the sales meetings within the Business Unit
- Coordinate the year agreement negotiations and annual contract activities with the accounts
- Define and execute promo strategies and plannings
- Manage sales advertisement budget
- Follow up on the performance of the key customers and propose adjustments when needed.
profile_positions.title: Trade Marketing Manager | Key Account Manager a.i.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible of developing, guiding, evaluating and further improving of data analysis and trade marketing activities for the OTC portfolio.

- Primary responsible of monitoring the sales results on brand, sku and account level (within retail Drug, Food and E-com channels). As well as the development of the market, category and competitors. 
- Actively contributing to the growth strategy of Viatris (OTC health care & oral care) and the realization of the sales and profitability targets. 
- Actively contributing to the growth strategy of the accounts, providing strategic promotional plannings and shelf positioning advice. 
- Knowledge implantation of the market and shopper developments (internal to management and OTC business unit, external to category managers and buyers).  
- Leading role in the alignment of the marketing plans with the account plans.
profile_positions.title: Trade Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Nielsen is the world's leading global measurement and data analytics company that provides intelligence on consumer buying behavior to (multi)national FMCG manufacturers and retailers.

As an Analytical Consultant I manage my own client portfolio, consisting of multinational FMCG manufacturers within the Food, Drug and Perfumery markets. 
I am responsible for delivering valuable insights to my clients in order to provide them a better picture of the market trends, the consumers, and a clearer view of how to reach them to drive growth.
profile_positions.title: Analytical Consultant

profile_positions.description:
• Responsible for quality and delivery commitments for own client portfolio (soft drinks, beer and liquor categories) and coordination of the production activities (first point of contact between onshore and offshore teams)

• Manage in full autonomy client technical requests, needs and demands (new databases, new products identification, methodology, etc.), communicate clearly and advise proactively on data base layouts and process simplifications

• Be in daily contact with clients and commercial team to maximize client satisfaction and convert their needs into leads and internal work orders

• Internal Project Champion: responsible for implementing the back-end of the new analysis platform in the Netherlands, establish local ways of working and processes.
profile_positions.title: Junior Client Liaison

profile_positions.description:
End of study internship 

- Heineken 0.0: 
Responsible for the 2018 Sampling Campaign (1.5 million samples) through multiple channels (instore, outdoor, digital, special events, etc.). Agency and budget management in full autonomy. 

- Heineken NL Sustainability: 
Total lead in the development of an innovative brand activation project, budget & agencies management. Participation to the elaboration of the new sustainability strategy for Heineken.
profile_positions.title: Brand Manager Assistant - Heineken & Heineken 0.0

profile_positions.description:
Maille International 
Gap year internship in Brand Development & Brand Activation for export markets

Brand Development Maille (mustard, vinegars, gherkins) : 
- Export innovation launches (86 countries in scope) & roll-outs of global innovations,
- Project & portfolio management (211 SKUs): coordination of Supply Chain, Finance, Legal (especially GMO Free in the US) and R&D,
- Business opportunities, cases and deliverables establishment, 
- Market and competitors analysis, 
- Design and packaging creation,
- Scopping & mapping. 

Brand Building Maille (mustard, vinegars, gherkins):
- New routes to markets (especially Travel retail & Israel),
- Marketing plans establishment hand in hand with the Area Managers and asset adaptation per country: global brand's strategy garantie,  
- Creation of instore, outstore & digital tools.
profile_positions.title: International Product Manager Assistant

profile_positions.description:
•	Develop Hollywood chewing-gum in the distribution networks
•	Monitoring the budget of Hollywood chewing-gum 
•	Supporting the implementation of trade marketing in stores: promotions, discounts, games, contests and sampling…
•	Tracking packaging: designing new packaging
•	Assisting in creating and executing brand support through various communication tools including digital marketing (Facebook etc)
•	Analyzing quantitative and qualitative data (Nielsen data), monitoring latest market trends and contributing to the periodic business planning processes + innovation follow-up (Hollywood MAX).
profile_positions.title: Assistant Brand Manager - Gum

profile_positions.description:
Representation of Mars Incorporation in Toulouse Business School thanks to the organization of events such as conferences, cocktails, competitions, networking evenings, forums, etc. 

Ended 1st at the Mars sales and negotiation competition.
profile_positions.title: Student ambassador

profile_positions.description:
Le Petit Tou is the Toulouse free city-guide, a 50-person non-profit organization. It was created in the mid-2000s and aims to promote the most original shops in Toulouse : restaurants, local pubs, hairdressing salons, clothing shops etc…

Since its creation, Le Petit Tou has steadily grown to establish itself as the first city-guide in Toulouse.
Here are some figures which can show it:
2015 edition: 120 000 units
2014 edition: 115 000 units
2013 edition: 100 000 units
2012 edition: 70 000 units
2011 edition: 50 000 units

>AWARDS:
► 2015 edition: 4th best French student association (according to Aneo)
► 2014 edition: “Best Graphisme Guide” prize rewarded by the Student City-Guide Awards Confederation + 5th best French student association (according to Crelacom agency & Aneo)
► 2013 edition: “Best Graphism Guide” prize rewarded by the Student City-Guide Awards Confederation + 9th best French student association (according to Crelacom agency & Aneo).

>MISSIONS 
► Prospecting and negotiating with partners and new companies for the funds of the guide, mainly financed by advertising contracts (budget €100,000). 
Principally acquisition of clients with cold calling and doorstep selling. 
► Prospecting shops which could be interested to be selected in the 2016 edition.
► Testing shops (restaurants, pubs,…) and writing articles about them (for the paper guide, website and mobile application). 
► Participating in the launching day distribution, setting up and organizing stands everywhere in Toulouse to ensure the distribution of guides. More than 100 000 people are coming to the famous Place du Capitole that day.
profile_positions.title: Sales Representative

profile_positions.description:
M.i.h Jeans is a high-ended fashion brand based in London. The products are available online and in department stores (Selfridges, Liberty, Le Bon Marché, etc.). 

Main missions:
-	Day to day running of the E-commerce business 
-       Sales analyses and reporting
-       Monthly return meetings and reports
-       Support the team during the rebrand period
-	General website maintenance support (Magento backend)
-       Website cross-sells 
-	Processing returns and exchanges
-       CRM
-	Maintaining highest standards of customer service at all times 
-	Follow up on customer requests
-	Online marketing support and analysis (Google Analytics, Adwords and Dotmailer) 
-       Affiliates support
-       Competitor survey and research 
-      Stock checks and updates (Full Circle).
profile_positions.title: E-commerce and Digital Marketing Intern

profile_positions.description:
Social360 is a social media based in London and New York, which provides social media monitoring and analysis for professionals. 

Missions:
Data collection on British politicians via the internet and social media, translated letters and key words in English from Dutch, German and French, looked for new clients.
